title: SA15N - 8-Channel Digital I/O Adapter - duagon
content: The SA15N provides five digital inputs, five digital outputs and three digital bidirectional inputs/outputs. The supported logic level is 3.3 V up to 24 V. The output current for each channel is 500 mA (sinking), but the maximum overall current is 2.5 A.

SA-Adapters are small universal boards providing the line drivers for legacy serial I/O, fieldbus interfaces and other I/O functions. One serial line is provided per adapter, which can be plugged directly to duagon products such as CPU boards as a mezzanine. Alternatively, the adapter can be connected to the front panel via ribbon cable.

The SA concept allows to add additional I/O interfaces to duagon products, enhancing flexibility for line transceivers and isolation requirements. Compatibility of SA-Adapters or a combination thereof with duagon products is determined by mechanical, performance, FPGA and operating system criteria and needs to be verified for every board configuration requested.
The SA15N complies with the EN 50155 standard for use in railway applications.
Long-term availability ensures an extended product life and future-safety.
